name: Artillery - Knights vs. Orcs
synopsis: The battlefield is calling! In Artillery: Knights vs. Orcs the knights and orcs fight from a distance with their powerful cannons. Choose a team and, utilising your full arsenal, bombard your opponent. Adjust the fire power and the angle of your cannon and don't forget to keep an eye on the wind direction and strength. - Exciting artillery action in a fantasy- comic style - 2 single player campaigns - 200 levels - Multiplayer mode with three difficulty levels
